name: Mrblobman's Programming Extravaganza
body:
#ChattyBots Bukkit/Spigot API
Special thanks to @pierredavidbelanger for the amazing Java API that made this possible.
###Server Administrators

***
 1. Download the [plugin jar](NOT AVAILABLE YET)
 2. Start the server.
 3. Visit the [wiki page](CONFIG) to learn about configuring the plugin.
 4. Enjoy the laughs from some of the crazy responses that these great personalities have to offer.

###Developers
   
***
 * Add the [plugin jar](NOT AVAILABLE YET) from the link above.
 * Visit the [wiki page](CONFIG) for a sample listener.
 * View the [Javadocs](http://mrblobman.github.io/ChattyBots-Bukkit-SpigotAPI/) or [source](https://github.com/MrBlobman/ChattyBots-Bukkit-SpigotAPI) for more help
 * Contact me on Spigot if you wrote anything fancy using the api
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
